I'm familiar with ITC us=
ing computers, radios, telephones and other devices. 
=C2=A0
I'd be very in=
terested in hearing what an EVP from a computer or phone memo sounds like, =
especially if they're full sentences asking for help and such. 
=C2=A0
What=
 I mean about "them" using=C2=A0anamolies, fluctuations and variables is si=
mply that, like an EMF meter=C2=A0that lights up or sounds when there's=C2=
=A0some change or fluctuation=C2=A0in detectable EM fields & energy pattern=
s/sources, it seems to create EVP's "they" need something just as=C2=A0adju=
stable (a medium that can be altered and affected)=C2=A0and/OR need to caus=
e/create/make some kind of fluctuation, variation=C2=A0or adjustment in con=
ditions=C2=A0in order to form a voice. 
=C2=A0
I can't see any other way th=
at white noise OR raw audio could possibly be manipulated to form voices if=
 some type of fluctuation, alteration or level of variability wasn't presen=
t, already occuring=C2=A0or made=C2=A0available to them.

well I was just asking cau=
se I never seen it before...but you do know you can get evp from ANY record=
ing device..well I do,but people does say that's not normal lol..I mean i g=
et evp through computers,recorders,my phone memo, or even my kids play reco=
rdings. this happens when I'm not even thinking about it sometime is annoyi=
ng when I'm trying to record something and get not just a moan but sentence=
s..usually asking for help or just letting me know they can see me..
=C2=A0=

Now with saying that I love my boxes and I get amazing results form those =
to. I was saying not sure if you need "anomalies, fluctuations and variable=
 conditions" that your speaking of...well at least I don't..

From: Mvanah Maloti <in=

=C2=A0 






It looks like a cool toy, but I'm not su=
re it would make a whole ton of difference in one's results, it might even =
detract from them. Others mileage & opinions may differ, naturally. 
=C2=A0=

It seems this device is trying to establish a very=C2=A0loose set of "cont=
rols" for capturing and validating EVP, but in my opinion this is the WRONG=
 thing to do in some ways...I think "they" need anomalies, fluctuations and=
 variable conditions for the best communication possible=C2=A0(something bo=
x-work provides them, and abundantly at that!). 
=C2=A0
Since working with =
the boxes I don't think I could ever go back to white noise EVP and be happ=
y; the sweeping radio is just too effective and light years ahead of what=
=C2=A0folks were doing even just=C2=A010-12 years (and months!)=C2=A0ago, I=
 feel. 
=C2=A0
Where the sweeping radio functions=C2=A0more like a proper t=
elephone (2 way), traditional EVP just feels like I might as well try=C2=A0=
tying=C2=A0two tin cans together with a string between them and hoping for =
something useful or interesting to=C2=A0be captured or come through. 
=C2=
=A0
Box work just=C2=A0feels=C2=A0a lot more proactive and effective to me=
=C2=A0in every way, shape and form. I can't think of a single advantage=C2=
=A0that classical EVP recording & research=C2=A0has or could offer one over=
=C2=A0the boxes. The skeptics are still going to bitch, moan and continue "=
debunking" both EVP and Ghost Box communication=C2=A0either way and that's =
fine with me, I don't work for them and I'm not trying to convince anybody,=
 lol. 
=C2=A0
$135.00 could get me another FLIP!=C2=A0 ;)
=C2=A0
-J
=C2=A0

p;</DIV>
<DIV>What I mean about "them" using anamolies, fluctuations a=

ation or level of variability wasn't present, already occuring or made=

<DIV>It looks like a cool toy, but I'm not sur=

V>
<DIV> </DIV>
<DIV>It seems this device is trying to establish a ver=

tion possible (something box-work provides them, and abundantly at tha=

<DIV>Since working with the boxes I don't thi=
nk I could ever go back to white noise EVP and be happy; the sweeping radio=

p;</DIV>
<DIV>Where the sweeping radio functions more like a proper te=
lephone (2 way), traditional EVP just feels like I might as well try t=
ying two tin cans together with a string between them and hoping for s=
omething useful or interesting to be captured or come through. </DIV>
=
<DIV> </DIV>

nd effective to me in every way, shape and form. I can't think of a si=
ngle advantage that classical EVP recording & research has or=

ither way and that's fine with me, I don't work for them and I'm not trying=
